name: SRAmbientLightSample
desc: The amount of ambient light in the user’s environment.

items.name: var chromaticity: SRAmbientLightSample.Chromaticity
items.desc: A coordinate pair that describes the sample’s light brightness and tint.

items.name: struct SRAmbientLightSample.Chromaticity
items.desc: A coordinate pair that describes light brightness and tint.

items.name: var lux: Measurement<UnitIlluminance>
items.desc: An object that describes the sample’s luminous flux.

items.name: var placement: SRAmbientLightSample.SensorPlacement
items.desc: The light’s location relative to the sensor.

items.name: enum SRAmbientLightSample.SensorPlacement
items.desc: Directional values that describe light-source location with respect to the sensor.
